title.value: UDS Plus Agriculter Worker Status Codes

description.value: The UDS Plus CodeSystem is a 'starter set' of codes supported for identifying agriculture worker status for UDS+ program.

definition.value: Patients whose principal employment is in agriculture and who establish a temporary home for the purposes of such employment as a migratory agricultural worker,

Patients whose principal employment is in agriculture on a seasonal basis (e.g., picking fruit during the limited months of a picking season), but who DO NOT establish a temporary home for purposes of such employment
